Prepare Docker Lab

(In progress)

Docker Hands-on Practice Challenges

Play with Docker (Recommended)

Play with Docker is a free web based Docker lab to practice multiple scenarios and PoCs. You can choose the level of difficulty and attend appropriate course as needed.

  • System administrators track
  • Developers track. Check
  • Full list of labs

Docker Tutorials and Labs

  • Docker Tutorials and Labs - collection of tutorials for learning how to use Docker with various tool. No more new labs or practices are adding to this repository and recommended to follow Play with Docker labs.

Docker Labs by Collabnix

Docker Labs is a free platform for learning docker created by Docker captain [https://github.com/ajeetraina] and team.

  • Docker WorkShop for Beginners
  • Docker Workshop for Intermediate Users
  • Docker Workshop for Advance Users
